plan.path
Class PitchMap

java.lang.Object
  plan.path.PitchMap
All Implemented Interfaces:
WorldMap
public class PitchMap
extends java.lang.Object
implements WorldMap

A class which defines the abstract representation of the real pitch, and reflects all the changes of that occur in the real world.

Author:
Daniel Stanoescu
